remarks: The canonical ` ZZ ` ring homomorphism applied to a ring's characteristic is zero.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Sep-2015.)
statement:
chrcl.c $e |- C = ( chr ` R ) $.
chrid.l $e |- L = ( ZRHom ` R ) $.
chrid.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
chrid $p |- ( R e. Ring -> ( L ` C ) = .0. ) $.
